headline: Edwards Lifesciences (EW) Investors Alerted to Today's Lead Plaintiff Deadline in Class Action Lawsuit Over TAVM Platform Disclosures - Hagens Berman
summary: - Investors in Edwards Lifesciences Corporation contend that the medical device giant misled them about the growth prospects of its core product, the Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement platform....
